content: **drops crochet toys ball and rattle** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ materials drops safran or muskat from garnstudio each cuddly toy weighs less than 50 g use remains and chose the colors you wish see pictures for suggestions drops crochet hook size 3 mm/c or d for safran or 3 5 mm/ e for muskat accessories poly stuffing for filling **pattern in french** here 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b13&d_id=32
